name: Swordsman VX Ace
description:
Swordsman VX Ace is a Pacman or Devil World on NES clone made in RPG Maker VX Ace with a mix of RPG elements. The game is 100% evented without any scripts implemented. You can play up to 3 levels in the game only and there will be more levels on the future updates. 

Features:

* Playable up to 3 levels

* Pacman or Devil World style gameplay

* Fast-paced survival

* Collect pellets to gain exp and proceed to the next level

* Kill monsters with the Sword Power-up to gain gold and exp

* Classification of enemies like from the original Pacman
